what we already said
um the second principle that they talk

your prompt to get the best Generations

typical prompt for a language model is
with
instructions context input data and an
output indicator So the instructions are
like you telling the model what you want
to happen so the example that that's
given here is classify the text into
neutral negative or positive so like
they're trying to do some type of

text and the neutral negative or
positive
and maybe there's some like context
additional context that you give around
that then there's input data which is
like classify the text in a neutral
negative positive and then you say text
colon there it is like there's my text
there's my input data and then you
provide an output indicator so sentiment
colon and that's where you expect there
to be an auto completion of sentiment
right like if you set up everything
right hopefully you get either neutral
negative or positive so you've described
the task
